price: Нисмо им Ми учинили неправду, него су они сами себи неправду нанели.
arabic: وَمَا ظَلَمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā ẓalamnāhum walākin kānū humu al-ẓālimīna
